testcase.name: postNewEmployees

error.message:
Don't know how to encode {"api-version":"6","auth-id":"47","api-section":"attendance","auth-token":"bgsdev"} as a byte stream.
Please use EncoderConfig (EncoderConfig#encodeContentTypeAs) to specify how to serialize data for this content-type. For example: "given().config(RestAssured.config().encoderConfig(encoderConfig().encodeContentTypeAs("appliction/json", ContentType.TEXT))). .."
